label: The deceased paid into Social Security via employment.
The deceased served in the active military, naval, or air service (and was not dishonorably discharged).
The deceased died while on active duty with the military, naval, or air service.
The deceased died, or likely died, of COVID-19.
The deceased died in the U.S., including its territories.
The deceased is buried in an unmarked grave.
The deceased's headstone or grave marker is privately purchased.
The deceased is buried in a private cemetery.
The deceased is a spouse or a child of a Veteran and is buried in a national, state, tribal, Veterans or military post cemetery.
You paid for the funeral/burial expenses.
You were NOT reimbursed for the funeral cost by any organization or government agency.
Your (applicant's) relationship to the deceased.
values: spouse; child; other family member; personal or official representative

label: One of the following circumstances apply to the deceased
values: died as a result of a service-connected disability; died while receiving or traveling to receive VA care; died while eligible, pending to receive, or receiving VA compensation or pension
